members.description: Type the number of shares available to the public for the account. This number is used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

members.name: tickerSymbol

constantValues: Type the stock exchange symbol for the account to track financial performance of the company. You can click the code entered in this field to access the latest trading information from MSN Money.

members.description: Type the stock exchange symbol for the account to track financial performance of the company. You can click the code entered in this field to access the latest trading information from MSN Money.

members.name: stockExchange

constantValues: Type the stock exchange at which the account is listed to track their stock and financial performance of the company.

members.description: Type the stock exchange at which the account is listed to track their stock and financial performance of the company.

constantValues: Type the account's website URL to get quick details about the company profile.

members.description: Type the account's website URL to get quick details about the company profile.

members.name: ftpSiteUrl

members.description: Type the URL for the account's FTP site to enable users to access data and share documents.

members.description: Type the primary email address for the account.

constantValues: Type the secondary email address for the account.

members.description: Type the secondary email address for the account.

constantValues: Type an alternate email address for the account.

members.description: Type an alternate email address for the account.

members.name: doNotPhone

constantValues: Select whether the account allows phone calls. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from phone call activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

members.description: Select whether the account allows phone calls. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from phone call activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

members.name: doNotFax

constantValues: Select whether the account allows faxes. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from fax activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

members.description: Select whether the account allows faxes. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from fax activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

constantValues: Type the main phone number for this account.

members.description: Type the main phone number for this account.

constantValues: Select whether the account allows direct email sent from Microsoft Dynamics 365.

members.description: Select whether the account allows direct email sent from Microsoft Dynamics 365.

constantValues: Type a second phone number for this account.

members.description: Type a second phone number for this account.

constantValues: Type the fax number for the account.

members.description: Type the fax number for the account.

members.name: telephone3

constantValues: Type a third phone number for this account.

members.description: Type a third phone number for this account.

members.name: doNotPostalMail

constantValues: Select whether the account allows direct mail. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from letter activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

members.description: Select whether the account allows direct mail. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account will be excluded from letter activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

members.name: doNotBulkEMail

constantValues: Select whether the account allows bulk email sent through campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account can be added to marketing lists, but is excluded from email.

members.description: Select whether the account allows bulk email sent through campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account can be added to marketing lists, but is excluded from email.

members.name: doNotBulkPostalMail

constantValues: Select whether the account allows bulk postal mail sent through marketing campaigns or quick campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account can be added to marketing lists, but will be excluded from the postal mail.

members.description: Select whether the account allows bulk postal mail sent through marketing campaigns or quick campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the account can be added to marketing lists, but will be excluded from the postal mail.

members.description: Type the credit limit of the account. This is a useful reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.
